greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is a square, otherwise a(n) = 2.
comment: Also number of central divisors of n, if n >= 1. - _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 10 2011.
Length of n-th row in the array of A207375, if n >= 1. - _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 27 2012
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
mathematica: Array[2 - Boole[IntegerQ@ Sqrt@ #] &, 105, 0] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 03 2017 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 15 2010
